column1: bobbie harrison| mrs. bobbie jean harrison
column5: 2015 at her residence. bobbie was a member of spring place baptist church. she was preceded in death by her parents
column6: m. f. and irene stanley; sisters
column7: joyce ray and joan ensley. survivors include her loving husband of 53 years
column8: roland harrison of chatsworth; son and daughter-in-law
column9: heath and allison harrison of chatsworth; daughters and sons-in-law
column10: darla and rhoney jackson of chatsworth
column11: and pam and scotty rich of chatsworth; brother and sister-in-law
column12: billy and gail stanley of dalton; sister and brother-in-law
column13: wylene and tommy underwood of carrolton; grandchildren
column20: nephews and cousins also survive. funeral services to celebrate the life of mrs. bobbie jean harrison will be held tuesday
column22: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. from the chapel of peeples funeral home with randall harrison officiating. interment will follow in the spring place cemetery. the family will receive friends at the funeral home monday from 5:00 p. m. until 9:00 p. m. peeples funeral home & crematory of chatsworth is in charge of the arrangements for mrs. bobbie jean harrison.
